title: Base Store - April, 2022
description: The Base Store now has a new search API, components with a new theming structure, and a Storybook package to run locally. Also, check out the news for the starter framework-specific updates.

title: FastStore - April, 2022
description: The FastStore API no longer includes unused Gatsby plugins and now handles channel as a facet for search and product queries. Also, check out the new Troubleshooting guides and the Starter submission form.

title: VTEX Headless CMS previews are now private by default
description: In order to access CMS previews, users will need to authenticate to the myvtex.com domain of their accounts.
